designations.source: Agreement on the Conservation of Populations of European Bats (EUROBATS)
designations.source_description: Agreement on the Conservation of Populations of European Bats as adopted at the Third Session of the Meeting of Parties, held 24 - 26 July 2000 in Bristol, UK.
designations.designation_description: Protection and enhancement of species populations through legislation, education, conservation measures and international co-operation.
designations.criteria_description: European populations of CHIROPTERA (Rhinolophidae and Vespertilionidae) occurring in Europe and non-European Range States.
